Class ShoppingOrder

  • Object
    • ShoppingOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ShoppingOrder
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the shopping order of the purchaser The shopping order is an aggregation of movie tickets
    Since:
    2019-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS3_Group4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
